resources.string: Choose your preferences for how you want your child to learn.
Press the help button to see what effect these have.
What do you want your child to learn?

This application was designed to help parents teach their young children important objects in the world around them. It was designed to grow with your child. My hope is to help your child, but also help the environment. With using this application to help your child learn you are also reducing the number of books that are created to do the same. Together we can make the world better, starting with our children and also the world they grow up in.

The preferences you set within this app will help decide how your child will learn. When you select ‘under 2’, only the learning activity will be active. This is mainly for learning with the parent’s help. If you select ‘2 or older’, the child will be given a prompt and will then find what the prompt asks for. If you do not select certain objectives, they will not be shown in either game. This are all on by default.
The Fun Way to Learn With Your Child!
